name: RI_1_1_2_Amend__Update__Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.2 Amend (Update) Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent makes any change to record entry content currently residing in storage considered permanent (persistent). 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.2.

statement.label: RI.1.1.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to update (amend) Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.2#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL maintain the original and all previously amended versions of the Record Entry, retaining each version instance without alteration.

statement.label: RI.1.1.2#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture a new uniquely identifiable version of the Record Entry, incorporating amended content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.2#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the signature event (e.g., digital signature) of the amendment Author, binding signature to Record Entry content.
